data.title: The Howard School
data.meta_description: Open Positions  - The Howard School is a private school located in Atlanta, GA, that empowers students with language-based learning differences.
data.text:
Lower School Principal

Start Date: 25-26 School Year

Accepting applications until October 15, 2024

The Lower School Principal is responsible for providing leadership, development, and support for instructional, curricular, behavioral, and support systems. This position also manages and supervises the Lower School personnel (faculty, staff and students) and budget.

Download the Lower School Principal Position Statement below to learn more about the position.

Download

Aftercare Support Part-Time

Start Date: 24-25 School Year

The Howard School is seeking enthusiastic individuals to implement a dynamic, safe, and enriching after-school care program. The ideal candidate is attentive, energetic, and motivated to make meaningful connections with students.

Download the Aftercare Support Position Statement below to learn more about the position.

Download

Substitute Teacher All Divisions

Start Date: 24-25 School Year

The Substitute Teacher will manage student learning in accordance with the goals and directives of the school and division.

Download the Substitute Teacher Position Statement below to learn more about the position.

Download

Literacy Specialist

Start Date: Late September 2024 - February 2025

Leave Coverage

The Literacy Specialist will join an interdisciplinary team that is committed to interactive project-based learning, student self-knowledge and self-advocacy, and collaboration. This is an interim position for leave coverage.

Download the Literacy Specialist Position Statement below to learn more about the position.
